Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Dubai Mall - Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

A quick follow up on the tasks required before the opening date on 13th Dec 24.

 

@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  Arrange Deep cleaning on 9th Dec early morning by 6am to start with BOH, because stock will be receiving on same day. Stationary and all requested tools to be delivered on 10th Dec.

 

@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  arrange NVR Installation on 9th Dec at 7am and ensure its connected properly

 

@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  arrange please security on 9th Dec from 8am to 8pm.

 

@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  ensure TG service will start on 13th Dec morning/ and CC machines manual invoice book is arranged for Daum boutique.

 

@Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  please be informed that stock receiving is planed on 9th Dec early morning, please lets ensure that IT Equipment, connection is done on time.

 

Regards,

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Jad Sfeir <Jad.Sfeir@chalhoub.com>; Elie Chalhoub <Elie.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Dubai Mall - Dubai Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Opening of Store “Daum Boutique at Dubai Mall” the handover date on 9th Dec and opening date is on Friday 13th Dec 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

wad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Jad Sfeir <Jad.Sfeir@chalhoub.com>; Elie Chalhoub <Elie.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
	Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Dubai Mall - Dubai Mall
	Importance: High

	 

	Dear All,

	 

	Kindly be informed that we have a Opening of Store “Daum Boutique at Dubai Mall” the handover date on 9th Dec and opening date is on Friday 13th Dec 2024.

	 

	To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

	 

	Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

	 

	Best Regards,

	 

	 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

Subject: Re: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Dubai Mall - Dubai Mall 
 
Hello Everyone,

This is unfortunately a slight delay as inspections will be taking place on Monday and it was not possible to have them finalized this week.

We will need to push stock delivery to 10th instead of 9th.

Please let me know how we can assist to shift the schedule of all actions smoothly.

 Best,

J
